My husband and I had previously stayed at Drees Haus in May 2021. While we had little time to spend in Oldenburg due to other commitments on our first visit, we fell in love with the little town and vowed to go back when we could spend some time exploring the Village of Spires. Our return visit in mid-July 2021 was just as we expected it would be - relaxing, interesting and fun. Ruthie, the host, was very responsive in our communications with her and the self check-in was a breeze. Drees Haus, very clean and well-kept, has everything one needs for a few nights' stay or longer. The kitchen offers full-size appliances, the shower is large enough with good water pressure and the bed in the first-floor bedroom is quite comfortable. There are well-maintained gardens surrounding the Haus and the small covered patio in the back yard - complete with lighting and an overhead fan - was a lovely spot for having dinner and drinks in the evening. The location of Drees Haus is perfect for exploring - within walking distance of several restaurants, a full-service market, a beverage store, the post office, an antique and ice cream store, a gift shop (open limited hours) and a gas station. The town feels quite safe for walking, even after dark - we had a chat with a local police officer who said that there is virtually no crime in Oldenburg! The town's common spaces, including a small park right next door to Drees Haus, are clean and welcoming. We would recommend taking the walking tour of historic Oldenburg - lots of interesting local history to explore. As we noted in our earlier review, there is no place in town where one can get breakfast (though Ruthie started us off with some fresh brown eggs so we were able to prepare a good morning meal at 'home'). Also, we found that healthy menu choices at the area restaurants are hard to find, so be prepared for (delicious) fried chicken and pork schnitzel when dining out. We so enjoyed our time in Oldenburg and we highly recommend a stay at Drees Haus - there couldn't possibly be a better place to stay in the area! - Terry and Don, Sheffield Village OH
